metadata.title: CVE-2021-36412 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in MP4Box in GPAC 1.0.1via the gp_rtp_builder_do_mpeg12_video function, which allows attackers topossibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted file in the MP4Boxcommand,

criterions.comment: gpac package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
